title: Can we get the champion spells icons here as well, please ? O_O

replies.body: This has been on our backlog for a while. I hope I can get a chance to do it soon!
Oops. Looks like I was wrong but hey, at least this is gonna happen!

Not for a long time. Unlike champions who are just 118 or so icons, Items which are a around 250 or so? Champion skills would number **500+**. 

"But it's only 5 skills per champion an-" We're not even counting stuff like icons that change (Such as {{champion:74}}'s ult looks or {{champion:266}}'s W toggle) and others.

Possible, yeah, but it'll be a while before we get -that- many options.
590 icons in the scenario where you dont use secondary icons, say Kha's evolved icons.

It's not like adding secondaries adds much, as a percent.  All the icons will be resized and added by a script and users will search for them by name so it's not like the greater number adds anything save a few more options and a small increase in bandwidth used.

Wrong. It'd take an hour, tops.

It's just a giant lookup table by names, which we have, and icon, which we also have. New button, drop down list, contents, {THIS} done.

Seriously, from a programming PoV it's a trivial change. Sure, it's a lot of code, but a walk way is a lot of paving stones, it's still not complex.

Ah, alright. I'm not at all in-tune with code so I assumed it'd take way longer than anything currently done. Though apparently Alice has already said "hey we're finishing it soon/it's on the to-do- list" so that's good.
